description.original: Automatically hides the sidebars when your window is resized to be narrower
description.translation: Automatically hides the sidebars when your window is resized to be narrower

dict.text: \"Hide Sidebars on Window Resize\": text: "在窗口调整大小时隐藏侧边栏"
dict..setName(\"Hide the left sidebar when th: .setName("当窗口这么窄时，隐藏左侧边栏")
dict..setName(\"Hide the right sidebar when t: .setName("当窗口这么窄时，隐藏右侧边栏")
dict..setName(\"Show sidebars back when windo: .setName("当窗口再次变宽时显示侧边栏")
dict..setDesc(\"Sidebars remain hidden if opt: .setDesc("如果禁用该选项，侧边栏将保持隐藏。")
